page.title: 18TOURISM __ continued.
page.content: 1 vessel was under private ownership. {Popularity _}Majority of crews _ 10, were on their first canal holiday, only 1 had taken 'many'.The length of holiday varied from 5 days to 2 weeks 13 crews taking a week. {Starting points}were linked to the location of the different boat yards, irrespective of this,the main {destination}(13) was Llangollen/Trevor {USEFUL COMMENTS _}requests for :_ Village store. Toilets. Better roads. Gift shop. More parking space. Tea room. Swimming area. Sign posts. Information leaflets. All parties wished to participate in a canal holiday again, but felt that traders could accomodate their needs better.More publicity of this type of holiday was requested from overseas visitors.
